price: Àwọn tí (ó jẹ́ pé) nígbà tí àdánwò kan bá kàn wọ́n, wọ́n á sọ pé: “Dájúdájú Allāhu l’Ó ni àwa; dájúdájú ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀ sì ni àwa yóò padà sí.”
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَٰبَتۡهُم مُّصِيبَةٞ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّآ إِلَيۡهِ رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
